imdb.title: Ergo Proxy
imdb.plot: In a post-apocalyptic future humans live in peace with androids in a domed city. However, a strange series of murders has intruded into bored inspector Re-l Mayer's life.

episodes.title: Hajimari no Kodou - Awakening
episodes.plot: Detective Re-l Mayer can't help but feel that something strange is brewing in Romdo City. When she's attacked late at night by a terrifying creature, her suspicions prove valid.

episodes.title: Yoki Shimin no Kokuhaku: Confession
episodes.plot: Re-l's account of her encounter with the mysterious phantom falls on disbelieving ears. If the truth is to be exposed, she will have to find it herself.

episodes.title: Mu e no Chouyaku: Mazecity
episodes.plot: Re-l discovers a tangent point between a male immigrant under her probationary supervision and the phantom.

episodes.title: Mirai Yomi, Mirai Yomi: Futu-Risk
episodes.plot: Re-l finds a clue which she uses to follow Vincent Law's footprints. Meanwhile, Vincent and Pino begin to explore the outside world.

episodes.title: Shoukan: Tasogare
episodes.plot: Re-l leaves Romdo for the first time. After she recovers from the initial shock, a colony appears made of rubble created from cast off scraps of Romdo. It was a place called the "Commune" where those who ran away from the dome gathered and lived.

episodes.title: Kikan: Domecoming
episodes.plot: Re-l catches an infectious disease while trying to rescue Vincent. The Commune's residents tell him that they will give him a vaccine to treat the infection if he obeys a certain condition.

episodes.title: RE-L124C41+
episodes.plot: Vincent, Pino, and the surviving members of the Commune escape from the shadows of Romdo. They push ahead down a single road to Vincent's hometown, the Mosk Dome. However, the harsh environment bears down on Vincent and his group.

episodes.title: Kousen: Shining Sign
episodes.plot: The journey to Mosk has begun. Vincent and Pino single-mindedly forge ahead the frozen land where nothing can be seen. Armed helicopters and combat jeeps suddenly appear. They have entered a combat zone where those who fight against AutoReivs live.

episodes.title: Kagayaki no Hahen: Angel's Share
episodes.plot: Vincent finds himself in an unfamiliar room. In front of the stunned Vincent appears Kazkis Hauer, a mysterious individual who is a lover of wine. What is the true identity of this beautiful man who invites Vincent?

episodes.title: Sonzai: Cytotropism
episodes.plot: Although referred to as a paradise by it's citizens, the administrative control system of Romdo is starting to fray. Realizing this, Raul and Daedalus insist on improving the system.

episodes.title: Shiroi Yami no Naka: Anamnesis
episodes.plot: Vincent gets lost in thick fog and arrives at a used-book store. He enters the store to ask for directions. The creepy owner of the store recommends a certain book to him. Vincent's name is engraved in the title of the book.

episodes.title: Kimi Hohoemeba: Hideout
episodes.plot: Vincent and Pino take a breather inside a deep forest. Pino sets out to explore their new surroundings and comes upon a girl picking flowers. But as soon as the girl realizes that Pino is there, she disappears into the forest. A fated reunion occurs.

episodes.title: Kousou no Shikoku: Wrong Way Home
episodes.plot: Chasing after the flower girl, Pino enters a cave where, in front of her eyes, appears the girl and a mysterious giant sitting beside her. Around the same time, a shadow approaches behind Vincent, who has been searching for Pino.

episodes.title: Anata ni Nita Dareka: Ophelia
episodes.plot: Vincent, Re-l and Pino stop at a deserted dome to replenish their supplies. Re-l discovers a beautiful verdant garden and proceeds to walk into it, totally unaware of the eyes staring at her.

episodes.title: Ki Akumu no Quiz Show! Who Wants to Be in Jeopardy!
episodes.plot: The reality game show craze reaches out to touch our world weary travelers. Vincent goes head to head in a fatal face off with a host who knows much more than he should.

episodes.title: Dead Calm: Busy Doing Nothing
episodes.plot: The travelers are at a standstill. Without any way to get moving, they spend the days in anguish, just hoping for the wind to start blowing. An incident occurs that serves to permanently differentiate Re-l from a Good Citizen.

episodes.title: Owaranai Tatakai: Terra Incognita
episodes.plot: The journey to Mosk is almost at its end. Along the way, Pino suddenly disappears. Vince and Re-l search for her and discover a cave leading underground. There they discover a truth that they could never begin to imagine.

episodes.title: Shuuchaku no Shirabe: Life After God
episodes.plot: Finally, Vincent and his group arrive at the Mosk Dome. As Vince walks all over the desolate dome city, he is unable to remember anything from his past.

episodes.title: Shoujo Smile: Eternal Smile
episodes.plot: A thrilling and enjoyable story about the AutoReiv, Pino, and her friends exploring a theme park called Smile Land. But behind this seemingly happy place, hidden truths lie in the smile of an android.

episodes.title: Kokuu no Seigan: Goodbye Vincent
episodes.plot: A pulse that beats out a rhythm like clockwork. A figure that wakes up in a hospital room and slowly raises his body. Who is this figure?

episodes.title: Toki Hate Tsuru Sho: Shampoo Planet
episodes.plot: Vince suddenly disappears. Re-l and Pino desperately search all over the city in order to find him. Awakening.

episodes.title: Shikkoku: Bilbul
episodes.plot: A sudden incident that falls upon Re-l and Pino. And the frequent appearances of Proxy. What could his true identity be?

episodes.title: Dairinin: Deus Ex Machina
episodes.plot: The closed paradise Romdo's mysterious veil covers is finally stripped off. What will become of Vince, Re-l, and Pino?
